config.DatabaseQuery:
select (postDeploy-preDeploy)	as DefectEscaperate from(
(SELECT count(*) as postDeploy FROM issueReleases ir join issues i on i.issueKey=ir.issueKey where released=1 and i.issueType="Bug" and releaseDate < created)t1,
(SELECT count(*) as preDeploy FROM issueReleases ir join issues i on i.issueKey=ir.issueKey where released=1 and i.issueType="Bug" and releaseDate > created)t2
)
